fields.headline: Best Breaks for under £500
fields.bodyText: UK From Dec 18-Jan 8, travelodge.co.uk is offering rooms (sleeping up to four) for £10 throughout the UK. Book until November 13. Germany Departing Nov 11, Expedia (0870 050 0808, expedia.co.uk) is offering three nights at the four-star Art'otel in Berlin for £181pp, including London City flights. Australia Austravel (0870 166 2070, austravel.com) is offering return flights to Perth from £299pp inc tax for Nov 17 and 24 departures from Gatwick. Book before Nov 8. India Until Nov 23, Goaway (020-7258 7800, goaway.co.uk) is offering a 14-night, two-centre break to Kerala and Goa from £499pp, including Gatwick flights, B&B and overnight train journey.
